live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38436.summary: Customers in the Radisson area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38436.title: June 12– Winnipeg (Radisson) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
